name: Balancing Act (hosasy, kometa)
description:
This game was made for United Game Jam 2020.

In Balancing Act, you have to ensure the safe coexistence of two sides, without one overtaking another. 4 different events will change balancing rules, not letting you to just sit down and rest. For example: rain will make plants grow faster, while slowing down humanity.

Since the theme of the game jam is "Two", we decided to make a game where you need to balance out two conflicting sides - nature, forests of which are being chopped down by humans, and humanity, whose cities are being overtaken by plants.

Assets used:

shovel sound - https://freesound.org/people/wobesound/sounds/488393/
construction sound - https://freesound.org/people/HonorHunter/sounds/271662/
menu music - https://freesound.org/people/tripjazz/sounds/522892/
game music - https://freesound.org/people/BaDoink/sounds/523677/
first font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Do+Hyeon?query=Jua&selection.family=Do+Hyeon#l...
second font - https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Jua?query=Jua#standard-styles
